resources.string: This service allows the application to run in the background, Hence, to get the best of this application, turn on Sayfe Service
Cannot Fetch Contacts because the permission to fetch contacts was denied
Welcome to Sayfe \nCreate and send out alerts of insecurity with ease by tapping on volume up button twice

To use Sayfe location-based features, please grant permission for the app to access your location and send sms once you\'re prompted . This will allow the app to send your real-time location to your selected contacts during an emergency, providing them with accurate information to assist you.

To use Sayfe discreet SOS feature triggered via the volume up button, please grant the Sayfe accessibility service permission in the settings once prompted. This will allow the app to function seamlessly in the background, immediately sending your location information to your selected contacts in case of an emergency.""
Nothing to see here, when you receive a notification, it will appear here
Nothing to see here, when you send a notification, it will appear here
